justification: Trade misunderstands Team B’s profile and needs (zero RB, values rookies/dual-threat QBs/injured buys). It labels Nick Holt a WR2 (he’s Tier 4) and claims B ‘needs’ an RB despite already having multiple. For Team A, calling Ethan Turner (Tier 4 TE, tough playoffs) an ‘upgrade’ is incorrect—A already rosters a Tier 1 TE and ample TE depth. The offer is lopsided and incoherent for A, with thin, error-prone rationale.
